pages.text: 26|137|Zhe buguo shi laoshengchangtan bale.
26|138|Women jue bu hui shou chengfa de.”
26|139|Tamen fouren ta, wo jiu huimiele tamen. Ci zhong dique you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de.
26|140|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|141|Sai mo de ren ceng fouren shizhemen.
26|142|Dangri, tamen de dixiong sa li ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|143|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|144|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|145|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|146|Nandao jing rang nimen anxin di zai zhe huanjing zhong me?
26|147|Zhe li you yuanpu he yuanquan,
26|148|you zhuangjia he juyou xianxi de rou suihua xu de ye zao shu,
26|149|nimen jingqiao de zao shan zao wu.
26|150|Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|151|Nimen buyao fucong guofen zhe de mingling,
26|152|tamen zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu.”
26|153|Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige shou guhuo de ren,
26|154|ni zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren. Ni yingdang zhaoshi yige jixiang, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
26|155|Ta shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhi mu tuo, ta ying de yibufen yinliao, nimen ying de mou ding ri de yibufen yinliao.
26|156|Nimen buke shanghai ta, fouze, jiang zaoshou zhongda ri de chengfa.”
26|157|Dan tamen zaile ta, suihou, tamen shen jue huihen.
26|158|Dan tamen haishi shoule chengfa, ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bu xindao.
26|159|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
